metadata.Title: CVE-2021-4010 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in xorg-x11-server in versions before 21.1.2 and before1.20.14. An out-of-bounds access can occur in the SProcScreenSaverSuspendfunction. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to dataconfidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-4010` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xorg-server-source-hwe-18.04 - 2:1.20.8-2ubuntu2.2~18.04.6
xserver-xephyr-hwe-18.04 - 2:1.20.8-2ubuntu2.2~18.04.6
xserver-xorg-core-hwe-18.04 - 2:1.20.8-2ubuntu2.2~18.04.6
xserver-xorg-legacy-hwe-18.04 - 2:1.20.8-2ubuntu2.2~18.04.6
xwayland-hwe-18.04 - 2:1.20.8-2ubuntu2.2~18.04.6
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: xorg-server-hwe-18.04 package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.20.8-2ubuntu2.2~18.04.6').
